alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Decatur; Ringgold (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 31 at 1:00PM CDT until March 31 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN DECATUR...EAST CENTRAL RINGGOLD AND SOUTHWESTERN CLARKE COUNTIES... At 1259 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Grand River, or 12 miles west of Leon, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Decatur City around 105 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this tornadic thunderstorm include Van Wert. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 12 and 25. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
